creditline: Bequest of Rev. Alfred Duane Pell
description: Bowl, ceramic-porcelain; bowl, white glaze with crowned monogram of Louis Philippe in pale rust color over the glaze on one side, made for the Chateau de St. Cloud
markings: Crowned monogram of Louis Philippe with date in green glaze; Sevres 1847 in double circular medallion and \'Chateau de St. Cloud: with a crown above in a rust medallion with serrated edges
title: Bowl
